official-title.#text:
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 2244) to extend the termination date of the Terrorism
			 Insurance Program established under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of
			 2002, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of motions to
			 suspend the rules; and providing for proceedings during the period from
			 December 12, 2014, through January 3, 2015.
